main event: A civilian witness reported seeing a bright, glowing object in the sky over Dayton, Ohio on July 12, 1967 around 6:22 PM.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5-10 minutes.
The witness described the object as bright and glowing, but could not determine its exact shape or size.
The object appeared to be stationary at first, then suddenly accelerated and disappeared.
The witness reported the sky was clear at the time of the sighting.
No sound was associated with the object.
